Name: Burg Wimmel
About the game: A game about finding and coloring cute items. Bring back the color to the black and white Burg Wimmel , a beautiful hand-drawn castle. Here you have to find cute cats, cheeky crows, cautious rats and many other creatures and items. Burg Wimmel Features: - 2.5D effects - Over 150 items to find - Random order improves replayability - Steam achievements - Save and Load functionality - A Leaderboard to immortalize your name
Meta Title: Burg Wimmel: Mar 5, 2023, Damian Windau and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Burg Wimmel? Check out the release date (Mar 5, 2023), developer insights from Damian Windau, and a complete game summary.
